en-GB.name: Wanted
en-GB.sort_hint: Hint: clicking on the dropdown and pressing any letter on the keyboard scrolls the dropdown down to the first team name beginning with that letter.
en-GB.desc:
Welcome to the wall of wanted players.
Watch out for these player, a bounty is out for each of their heads!
en-GB.title:
What is the bounty for this player's head?
This could be anything from raw gold to a free bonus skill for one of the players on the killing team.
en-GB.note: Please note: Once the player has been killed it is up to a leagues commissioner (admin) to give the appropriate award.
